TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CursorConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: Converts a object to and from other types.

span.span: Converts a object to and from other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 適用於兩種模式： 指定標準的資料指標 (的其中一個靜態常數名稱) 或指定的檔案名稱。 works for two modes: specifying a standard cursor (one of the static constant names of ) or specifying a file name. 具名的檔案必須是`.cur`或`.ani`延伸模組所識別的檔案。The named file must be a `.cur` or `.ani` file identified by extension. 請參閱[如何： 變更資料指標類型](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-change-the-cursor-type.md)。See [How to: Change the Cursor Type](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-change-the-cursor-type.md).
